Description.Name: Chameleon Ligjht Polarization Shield
Description.Details: The Chameleon Light Polarization Shield was a crowning jewel in the Star League's technological cap, a primitive system of mimetic shielding that warped light around the carryingÂ BattleMechÂ such that it was visually distorted and blurred, rendering it difficult to hit at best and impossible to hit at worst.
